law.catch_line: Transfer of State Soil Conservation Committee functions to Soil and Water Conservation Commission.
law.text: All of the functions of the State Soil Conservation Committee provided in this chapter are hereby transferred to and shall be exercised by the Soil and Water Conservation Commission.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 60. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 68, Art. XIV, sec. 4.
